title: IO Catering
desc: Developed a sleek and modern static website for IO Catering, crafted to showcase their complete menu in an elegant and user-friendly manner. The website is designed with a focus on simplicity and professionalism, ensuring an intuitive experience for visitors. It features a dedicated contact page with a fully functional form, allowing potential clients to easily make inquiries or bookings. The layout is carefully structured to highlight the brand's offerings while maintaining a visually appealing and stylish design. By combining functionality with aesthetics, the website establishes a strong and professional online presence that effectively represents IO Catering's brand and services.

title: Skin Bar By Ash
desc: Designed and developed a modern, clean, and visually appealing multi-page website for my client, Ash, tailored to effectively represent her business online. The website features an intuitive layout that provides comprehensive information about her business, highlighting the treatments and services she offers. Additionally, a functional and user-friendly contact page is included, enabling seamless communication for inquiries and appointments. The design focuses on delivering a professional and engaging user experience, reflecting the quality and expertise of her brand.
